DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this method study in healthy volunteers is to determine the extent of sensory block following Transversus Abdominis Plane (TAP) block with 24 hours infusion of ropivacaine versus infusion of saline. Furthermore, to determined the analgesic effect of the TAP block and the influence on the lung function.
DOC.brief_title: Method Study: Bilateral TAP Block With 24 Hours Infusion
DOC.criteria: age between 18 and 30 years written consent ASA 1 BMI between 18 and 25 males unable to communicate in Danish relevant drug allergy alcohol or/and drug abuse daily intake of prescription pain medication the last 4 weeks pain medication in the last 48 hours previously operated abdominal
